P. L. Sperr

2-An Italian Bookstand on 'first Avenue, Manhattan.

3-A book peddler at Essex and Houston Streets.

title: Occupations - Peddlers - Books.

text:
Postal cards have become an institution in this country. The Hebrew New Year also warrants the tidings of cards at Clinton and Rivington Streets.

September 25, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Occupations - Peddlers - Newspapers - Books - Stationery - Postal cards.
